title: Bug 139343[regression]Can not use document to preview report document when deploy birt.
description: Summary: [regression]Can not use document to preview report document when deploy birt.Steps to reproduce:1. Deploy birt2. Render a report document3. Preview the report document by using documentResult:The design file C:\apps\jakartatomcat5.5.7\webapps\birt060428\ has error and can not be run.
